content:
During the parsing of the rubble of the Russian five -storey residential building, rescuers were debollating the human body.

About thisShe reported March 13State Emergency Service.

This is the first victim of an enemy attack. It is also known about 8 victims. At least 30 apartments were damaged, 15 of which are completely destroyed. The work is ongoing. People can still be under the rubble.

Asreported the armyinform, the number of dead after the Russian blow on Kryvyi Rih increased to 5.
title: In the place of the Russian blow in Sumy found the body of a dead man
description: This was reported on March 13 by the State Emergency Service. This is the first ...
author: Army Inform
